title: scholarship
content: when will the scholarship list be announced? and how do they usually announce it?

comments.body: your semester started on the 10th of this month right? they'll announce the scholarships in early to mid march.
both cnr and mrd happen every semester is it? or is it like cnr happens every sem and mrd at the end?
yes, every sem. the only difference is that cnr is based on sgpa and mrd on cgpa.
are the scholarships branch wise or smthg ? like top 25 % of cse or ece and so on or 25 % of phy and chem cycle ?
If ur in first year it's cycle based, then it's branch wise when you go to your respective dept
For 6th sem students they sent a confirmation mail to selected students... They may not release a list this time
spoiler alert: you didnt make it cuz fuck you
